es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.api

Interface IAmBalloonController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AmBalloonController

    public interface IAmBalloonController
    Interface for controller of AmBalloon. Details of AmBalloon and its properties in AmCharts API.
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro
